title: How the Organizer of the Paris Attacks Slipped Through Authorities’ Hands
body:
Jan. 15, 2015 A manhunt in Athens

For months, investigators had been intercepting suspicious calls from Mr. Abaaoud originating in Athens that lead them to believe he could be planning an attack in Europe. They track the calls to Verviers, Belgium, where police raid a safehouse and find compounds like the the ones later used in explosives in the Paris attacks. The discovery sets off a manhunt in Greece, but officials lose track of Mr. Abaaoud after his SIM card stops transmitting immediately after the raid.
summary: Jan. 15, 2015 A manhunt in AthensFor months, investigators had been intercepting suspicious calls from Mr. Abaaoud originating in Athens that lead them to believe he could be planning an attack in Europe.They track the calls to Verviers, Belgium, where police raid a safehouse and find compounds like the the ones later used in explosives in the Paris attacks.The discovery sets off a manhunt in Greece, but officials lose track of Mr. Abaaoud after his SIM card stops transmitting immediately after the raid.
